REUTERS.UNKNOWN: A f0576 reute r f BC-DOW-CHEMICAL-LAUNCHES 03-02 0066

TEXT.TITLE: DOW CHEMICAL LAUNCHES 200 MLN SWISS FRANC BOND
TEXT.BODY: Dow Chemical Co has launched a 200 mln Swiss franc, 12-year bond with a 4-3/4 pct coupon priced at 100-1/4 pct, lead manager Union Bank of Switzerland said. The issue carries a call option from 1993 at 102 pct, declining thereafter by 1/2 percentage point per year. Subscriptions close March 18 and payment date is April 2. Reuter
